title: ğŸ CLEOPATRA UK TOUR ğŸ
excerpt: The CLEOPATRA UK tour is HERE! Grab your tickets for the London CLEOPATRA EXTRAVAGANZA and many more stops across the country.
body:
I am _beyond_ excited to announce the UK tour dates and locations for the release of **CLEOPATRA**. Tickets are going to go fastâ€¦especially for the **London CLEOPATRA EXTRAVAGANZA** (this genius of a rhyme came from my publicists mind).

Thank you to all the booksellers who are championing this release by opening their doors to little olâ€™ me.

A _huge_ thank you to my wonderful moderators and fellow panellists. You guys rock, Iâ€™m so excited to do these events with you.

These arenâ€™t the only events Iâ€™ll be doing this year - thereâ€™ll be many more festivals and events to come.

And if youâ€™re based on the US East Coast keep an eye out in the coming weeks...

Tickets are limited and selling fast. Visit the [Events page](https://jimdynasty.github.io/SEAweb/events.html) for ticket links!

See you on tour! ğŸ’œâœ¨

title: ğŸ USA CLEOPATRA EVENTS ğŸ
excerpt: I am so excited to announce that I will be crossing the pond to launch Cleopatra!
body:
**BOSTON: 19th Feb**
I get to chat to the amazinglyÂ talentedÂ [@kuangrf](https://www.instagram.com/kuangrf/)Â at the iconic Brattle Theatre in collaborationÂ with theÂ [@narrativebookshop](https://www.instagram.com/narrativebookshop/)Â â€”a proudly immigrant-woman owned & operated bookshop, with an emphasis on amplifying marginalized voices & experiences.

**NYC: 23rd Feb **
Every visit to NYC takes me toÂ [@strandbookstore](https://www.instagram.com/strandbookstore/)Â so Iâ€™m so so excited to be launching CLEOPATRA thereâ€”and with the incomparableÂ [@thechloegong](https://www.instagram.com/thechloegong/)Â as well? This night is going to be epic.

Thank you to the bookstores and theÂ [@ballantinebooks](https://www.instagram.com/ballantinebooks/)Â team for all the work behind the scenes. Now itâ€™s up to you guys to grab those tickets.
